from PLEDGE c

select count(*) from PLEDGE c inner join CONSTITUENT p on c.CONSTITUENT_ID = p.CONSTITUENT_ID where p.SITE_NAME = #siteName#
sqlMap.select: and c.CONSTITUENT_ID = #constituentId# order by c.CREATE_DATE desc

select , , , IF ($sortColumn$ IS NULL or $sortColumn$ = '', 1, 0) AS isnull
from PLEDGE c inner join CONSTITUENT p on c.CONSTITUENT_ID = p.CONSTITUENT_ID left outer join DISTRO_LINE dl on c.PLEDGE_ID = dl.PLEDGE_ID
where p.SITE_NAME= #siteName# and c.CONSTITUENT_ID = #constituentId#
order by isnull ASC, $sortColumn$ $sortDir$ limit $offset$,$limit$

select c.PLEDGE_ID, c.AMOUNT_PER_GIFT, c.AMOUNT_TOTAL, c.AMOUNT_PAID, c.AMOUNT_REMAINING, c.PLEDGE_DATE, c.PLEDGE_STATUS, c.RECURRING,
from PLEDGE c inner join CONSTITUENT p on c.CONSTITUENT_ID = p.CONSTITUENT_ID where p.SITE_NAME= #siteName# and c.CONSTITUENT_ID = #constituentId# and c.PLEDGE_STATUS != 'cancelled' order by c.PLEDGE_DATE desc

and (c.END_DATE >= #date# or c.END_DATE is null) and c.PLEDGE_STATUS in
#statuses[]#
order by c.PLEDGE_ID limit $offset$,$limit$

select count(*) from PLEDGE c inner join CONSTITUENT p on c.CONSTITUENT_ID = p.CONSTITUENT_ID where p.SITE_NAME = #siteName# and (c.END_DATE >= #date# or c.END_DATE is null) and c.PLEDGE_STATUS in
#statuses[]#

select ,
custFld.FIELD_VALUE
from PLEDGE c inner join CONSTITUENT p on c.CONSTITUENT_ID = p.CONSTITUENT_ID
left outer join CUSTOM_FIELD custFld on c.PLEDGE_ID = custFld.ENTITY_ID and custFld.ENTITY_TYPE = #entityType# and DATE(#asOfDate#) >= custFld.START_DATE and DATE(#asOfDate#) <= custFld.END_DATE and custFld.FIELD_NAME = #fieldName#

insert into PLEDGE (AMOUNT_PER_GIFT, AMOUNT_TOTAL, AMOUNT_PAID, AMOUNT_REMAINING, CURRENCY_CODE, COMMENTS, CREATE_DATE, END_DATE, FREQUENCY, PLEDGE_CANCEL_DATE, PLEDGE_CANCEL_REASON, PLEDGE_DATE, PROJECTED_DATE, RECURRING, START_DATE, PLEDGE_STATUS, UPDATE_DATE, CONSTITUENT_ID) values (#amountPerGift#, #amountTotal#, #amountPaid#, #amountRemaining#, #currencyCode#, #comments#, now(), #endDate#, #frequency#, #pledgeCancelDate#, #pledgeCancelReason#, #pledgeDate#, #projectedDate#, #recurring#, #startDate#, #pledgeStatus#, now(), #constituent.id#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS value
sqlMap.update: update PLEDGE set AMOUNT_PER_GIFT = #amountPerGift#, AMOUNT_TOTAL = #amountTotal#, AMOUNT_PAID = #amountPaid#, AMOUNT_REMAINING = #amountRemaining#, COMMENTS = #comments#, CURRENCY_CODE = #currencyCode#, END_DATE = #endDate#, FREQUENCY = #frequency#, PLEDGE_CANCEL_DATE = #pledgeCancelDate#, PLEDGE_CANCEL_REASON = #pledgeCancelReason#, PLEDGE_DATE = #pledgeDate#, PLEDGE_STATUS = #pledgeStatus#, PROJECTED_DATE = #projectedDate#, RECURRING = #recurring#, START_DATE = #startDate#, UPDATE_DATE = now(), CONSTITUENT_ID = #constituent.id# where PLEDGE_ID = #id#
update PLEDGE set AMOUNT_PAID = #amountPaid#, AMOUNT_REMAINING = #amountRemaining#, PLEDGE_STATUS = #pledgeStatus#, UPDATE_DATE = now() where PLEDGE_ID = #id#
